input-error.corpus-wrong: Only letters and numbers are allowed
input-error.pattern: Only alphabetic characters and special characters “-” (hyphen), “ ” (space) and “'” (apostrophe) are allowed

location.title: Welcome to UBS! First, choose the location of waste disposal. Currently, we work in Kyiv and the suburbs.
location.info-city: The location of Kyiv also includes Hatne, Horenka, Zazymie, Irpin, Kniazhychi, Kotsiubynske, Novosilky, Petropavlivska Borshchahivka, Pohreby, Prolisky, Sofiivska Borshchahivka, Chaiky, and Shchaslyve.
location.info-region: Currently, the Kyiv region includes cities within 20 km of Kyiv

order-details.order-content: Please note that the minimum order amount is 500.00 UAH
order-details.min-sum: The minimum order amount must be {{minOrderValue}} UAH
order-details.max-sum: The maximum order amount is {{maxOrderValue}} UAH
order-details.min-big-bags: Please note that the minimum order must contain at least {{minAmountOfBigBags}} packages of 120l
order-details.max-big-bags: Please note that the maximum order can contain {{maxAmountOfBigBags}} packages of 120l
order-details.question-certificate: If you want to use the certificate, enter its number
order-details.failed-certificate: Certificate not accepted, please try again
order-details.certificate-not-exist: The certificate was not accepted. Please try again
order-details.not-found-certificate: Certificate not found; check that the data is correct.
order-details.activated-oversum: A certificate for {{certificateSum}}.00 UAH is activated in excess of the amount of your order. The balance of {{certificateLeft}}.00 UAH does not return. The certificate is valid until {{ certDate}}
order-details.activated: The certificate for the amount of {{certificateSum}} UAH has been activated. The certificate is valid until {{certDate}}
order-details.expired: Certificate is invalid. Certificate validity is up to {{certDate}}
order-details.bonus-need: Do you want to take advantage of bonuses?
order-details.shop-order-question: If you are waiting for an order from our Eco-shop, please enter its number
order-details.cant-found-order: If you cannot find the order number, please indicate your name and surname for which you placed the order in the comments.
order-details.comment-subtitle: Do you want to add extra items to your order? Write about them in the comments.
order-details.link: The list of extrapositions and terms of delivery
order-details.any-details: Any details you would like to report further about this order
order-details.export-address: The address of export of the ordered services
order-details.comment-error: You can't enter more than 255 characters.
order-details.order-error: The number was entered incorrectly.  Please try again.
order-details.choose-payment: You can make a payment in one of the selected methods below

extra-packages-pop-up.title: Extrapositions
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-start: In addition to paid packages, UBS Courier can pick up some items of recyclable material for processing
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-end: provided that they are clean and do not require further sorting
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-second: the number of extrapositions of UBS Courier, necessarily fulfilling simple conditions:
extra-packages-pop-up.metal: tin cans (type of packaging - tight bag/box);
extra-packages-pop-up.bottles: transparent PET bottles used for drinks (type of packaging - sack/bag);
extra-packages-pop-up.cardboard: corrugated cardboard (separate the tape, stickers and all metal staples, for easy transport - fold it flat);
extra-packages-pop-up.polyfoam: polyfoam (type of packaging - 120 l bag (we take no more than 1 bag for 1 shipment)).
extra-packages-pop-up.condition1: Indicate in the comment that you plan to give free positions to the Courier, as well as indicate their volume and number.
extra-packages-pop-up.condition2: Pack each type of package separately. A mix of these wastes in one bag/box will not be collected by UBS Courier. Tie up packages before handing them over.

personal-info.pop-up-comment-placeholder: The road is under repair. Access to the house is available from the house number 15.
personal-info.info-no-address: You have no addresses added. Please add an address.
personal-info.info-coment-placeholder: Any details you would like to tell us further
personal-info.first-order: Please note, the Courier picks up the packages at the entrance and does not go upstairs

submit-order.after-payment: After placing an order, you can make the payment in the chosen way

confirmation.submit-title: In case of closing, your order will be saved in your personal account. Do you want to save this order?
confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to exit?
confirmation.subTitle: Your order will not be saved

ubs-tariffs-pricing-page.delete-tariff-text1: Are you sure you want to deactivate the "
ubs-tariffs-pricing-page.delete-tariff-text2: " service? Information about this service will be hidden from customers.

confirm-page.order-not-paid-after: was not paid for. Please try again.
confirm-page.description: Thank you for your waste control!
confirm-page.questions: If you have any questions, you can

ubs-homepage.general: Convenient pick up service from UBS provides fast garbage collection

pick-up-city.title: PICK UP city is a digital waste sorting service.
pick-up-city.content: Suitable for anyone who wants to sort without leaving home and get their own sorting statistics.

courier.title: What can be given to the courier?

content.li_1.2: everything is the same that the UBS sorting station accepts for recycling or safe incineration, waste for recycling and incineration can be put in one bag - we will sort everything for you
content.li_2.1: must be in a separate package -
content.li_2.2: rules for preparing textiles for delivery
content.li_3.1: we advise you to find a green bell container for glass in your area

price.title: The cost of the service
price.li_1: 1 bag with a volume of 120 liters with recycled materials and non-liquid plastics - UAH 280.
price.li_2: 1 bag of 60 liters with textile waste - UAH 220.
price.li_3: 1 bag of 20 liters with textile waste - UAH 110.

extraoffer.title: In addition to packages, the courier can pick up an unlimited number of extra items (except styrofoam) for FREE, these are:
extraoffer.condition: ☝️ provided that they are clean, dry and collected in SEPARATE bags or bags

items.li_3: PET bottles are transparent from under drinks
items.li_5: Styrofoam (restriction - we pick up one bag of 120 l for 1 delivery free of charge)

conditions.title: You can give the above extrapositions to the courier free of charge by fulfilling simple conditions:
conditions.item_1: When ordering the service, indicate that you plan to give the courier free extrapositions, and indicate their number.
conditions.item_2: Fold each type of packaging separately. A mix of these wastes in one bag/box will not be picked up by the courier. Tie each bag tightly.

minimum-volume.title: Minimum volume for export:
minimum-volume.li_2: 20 packages of 120 liters in the suburbs within 20 km of Kyiv

ubs-courier.info-header: Convenient pick up service from UBS provides fast garbage collection. Bonus — free removal of an unlimited number of extrapositions and free delivery of goods from our eco-shop.

content.li_2: Collect a mix of clean and dry waste in bags.
content.li_3: Collect textile waste in a separate bag.
content.li_4: Order and pay for the service
content.li_5: Wait for feedback and a meeting with the courier.

content.li_2: Minimum order within a radius of 20 km from Kyiv (2400 l).
content.li_2.1: Lifehack: team up with your neighbors ☝️
content.li_3: One package should not weigh more than 30 kg

content.li_1: Along with paid packages, the courier can pick up an unlimited number of some extrapositions of raw materials for processing for free.
content.li_2: Mandatory condition: they must be clean, dry and packed in a frame bag.

price.caption: The cost of PICK UP service

price-description.li_1: With recyclable materials and illiquid plastics with a volume of 120l.

steps-title.li_2: Order and pay for the service

steps-content.li_1: Create your personal account, where the history of your orders will be stored.
steps-content.li_2: Preparation of the route will take from 2 to 9 days.
steps-content.li_3: If you can’t be there at the agreed time, then leave the packages at the concierge but be sure to notify the Courier.
steps-content.li_4: Keep track of your order history.

warning.massage: Attention! Our website is in testing mode. Have you noticed a bug? Please leave your feedback and we will improve our service as soon as possible.

sign-in.title: Welcome back!
sign-in.fill-form: Please enter your details to sign in.
sign-in.email-must-be-at-least-1-characters-long: Email must be at least 1 characters long
sign-in.this-is-not-email: Please check if the email is written correctly
sign-in.password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters long without spaces
sign-in.account-has-been-deleted: Your account has been deleted, please contact us to restore it

sign-up.fill-form-up: Please enter your details to sign up.
sign-up.invalid-user-name: Username must not contains a dot at the beginning, few dots in a row, special characters, Cyrillic letters
sign-up.user-name-size: The user name must contain 1-30 characters and can contain letters, numbers and a dot. Dot at the start, at the end and consecutive dot is forbidden
sign-up.first-name-must-be-at-least-1-characters: User name must be at least 1 characters long
sign-up.last-name-must-be-at-least-1-characters-: Last name must be at least 1 characters long
sign-up.email-must-be-at-least-1-characters-long: Email must be at least 1 characters long
sign-up.this-is-not-email: Please check if the email is written correctly
sign-up.the-user-already-exists-by-this-email: The user with this email already exists
sign-up.password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters in length
sign-up.too-long-password: Password must be less than 20 characters long without spaces.
sign-up.password-spaces-error: Password must be at least 8 characters long without spaces
sign-up.password-symbols-error: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z), one lowercase letter (a-z), a digit (0-9), and a special character (~`!@#$%^&*()+=_-{}[]|:;”’?/<>,.)
sign-up.haveyou-account: Do you already have an account?

auth.submit-email: Congrats! Your profile is created. Please check the email sent with a link to confirm your email address.

forgot-password.already-sent: Password restore link already sent, please check your email
forgot-password.email-not-exist: The user with this email does not exist
forgot-password.title: Trouble singing in?
forgot-password.fill-form: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to regain access to your account.

restore-password.title: Do you want to change your password?
restore-password.password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters in length
restore-password.password-spaces-error: Password must be at least 8 characters long without spaces
restore-password.password-symbols-error: Password has contain at least one character of Uppercase letter (A-Z), Lowercase letter (a-z), Digit (0-9), Special character (~`!@#$%^&*()+=_-{}[]|:;”’?/<>,.)
